titleStmt.title: A poetical meditation wherein the usefulness, excellency, and several perfections of Holy Scripture are briefly hinted.
titleStmt.author: Clark, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N. Ranew, and J. Robinson, at the Angel in Jewn-Street.
